content: this is my version of the classic 10 point hot pad this is crochet in a spiral so there are no joining of rounds and chaining up also i use the foundation row single_crochet to start the points the pdf is a simple 2 page print out but on my blog i have detailed photo tutorials to complete this project including step by step on how to do the foundation row single_crochet if the ravelry link doesn t work i have this same pdf available as a download from my blog linked to another source
